settings.servers.onboarding.title: Welcome to Dokploy Cloud ðŸŽ‰
settings.servers.onboarding.description: Thank you for choosing Dokploy Cloud! ðŸš€ We're excited to have you onboard. Before you dive in, you'll need to configure your remote server to unlock all the features we offer.
settings.servers.onboarding.requisites.i: Before getting started, please follow the steps below to ensure the best experience:
settings.servers.onboarding.complete.sub: Did you know you can deploy any number of applications that your server can handle?
Here are some of the things you can do with Dokploy Cloud:
settings.servers.onboarding.features.sca: Deploy and scale your applications effortlessly to handle any workload.
settings.servers.onboarding.features.aut: Protect your data with automatic backups.
settings.servers.onboarding.features.ope: Big list of common open source templates in one-click.
settings.servers.onboarding.features.cus: Link your own domains to your applications for a professional presence.
settings.servers.onboarding.features.ciC: Implement continuous integration and deployment workflows to streamline development.
settings.servers.onboarding.features.dat: Efficiently manage your databases with intuitive tools.
settings.servers.onboarding.features.tea: Collaborate with your team on shared projects with customizable permissions.
settings.servers.onboarding.features.mul: Deploy applications in multiple programming languages to suit your needs.
settings.servers.onboarding.features.api: Integrate and manage your applications via robust and well-documented APIs.

settings.monitoring.validation.serverRef: Server refresh rate must be at least 2 seconds
settings.monitoring.validation.retention: Retention days must be at least 1

settings.monitoring.page.description: Monitor your servers and containers in realtime and receive notifications when they reach their thresholds.
settings.monitoring.alert.refreshRate: Using a lower refresh rate will increase CPU and memory usage. We recommend 30â€?0 seconds.
settings.monitoring.form.serverRefreshRa: Refresh interval for server metrics (in seconds).
settings.monitoring.form.containersRefre: Refresh interval for container metrics (in seconds).
settings.monitoring.form.cronJob.label: Cron Job
settings.monitoring.form.cronJob.descrip: Cron schedule for cleaning up metrics data.
settings.monitoring.form.retentionDays.d: Number of days to retain server metrics data.

settings.monitoring.form.services.exclud: Services that will be excluded from monitoring.
settings.monitoring.form.cpuThreshold.de: Alert when CPU usage exceeds this percentage.
settings.monitoring.form.memoryThreshold: Alert when memory usage exceeds this percentage.

settings.monitoring.form.token.descripti: Token used to authenticate metrics requests.
settings.monitoring.form.callbackUrl.des: URL where metrics notifications will be sent.
